name: A Blackhole Ate My Town
description:
Created in less than 48 hours for the STL Arcade Jam 2018.

Play as a black hole sucking up small things around town until you scale up to be able to suck up even bigger things.  Try to take out the whole town!

This game and controls were made/configured to work on a Winnitron arcade cabinet.

Arrow keys or WASD to move around

. or ~ to select

/ or 1 to deselect

Esc to go back / quit
